channel.title: NPC's won't drop items? PI
channel.description:
Hello, for some reason my npc's don't drop items, i've tried correcting what I thought was the problem, but now when I compile I have 11 errors, (it's okay i can fix that) but that's not the problem, the problem is my NPC's only drop charms, nothing else, and yes I edited their drops, and all of their drop rates, can anyone help me, or does anyone know what to do?
Thankyou

item.title: NPC's won't drop items? PI
item.dc:creator: @nickypie nickypie
item.description:
@nickypie wrote:

NPC_DROPS or somtin like that, the npc drops for pi are fuked up as shit, so i got em in config

Read full topic

Look in config.java there might be npc drops in there

What would it be under? I looked, didn’t see much.
